title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3 - Procedures Applicable To All Proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3 - Procedures Applicable To All Proceedings

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Applications to other authorities
§ 3.2 - Service and effectiveness of commission documents
§ 3.3 - Waivers
§ 3.4 - Subpoenas
§ 3.5 - Documents filed with the secretary
§ 3.6 - Motion practice
§ 3.7 - Rehearings
§ 3.8 - Oral argument before the commission
§ 3.9 - Settlement procedures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 8, 16[1], 19, 20[1], 22, 23, 66[10]-[11], 80[8]-[9], 89-c [8]-[9], 94[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
